p: 5,6β-epoxy-1-oxo-witha-2-ene-27-ethoxy-olide purified from plant roots was studied for the anti-stress, lactate dehydrogenase, serum creatine phosphokinase, serum corticosterone level, and serum lipid peroxidation ( 55). The standardized root extract of W. somnifera was investigated against chronic stress, hyperglycemia, plasma corticosterone, and male sexual dysfunction in male Wistar rats. The results showed that the root extract (concentrations of 25 and 50 mg/kg) exhibits significant anti-stress and adaptogenic activities in stress-induced immunological perturbations of mice ( 87).
